#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,lv,uv,count,ctr,j,i,sum,d;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        count=0;
        scanf("%d%d",&lv,&uv);
        for(i=lv;i<=uv;i++)
        {
            j=i;
            sum=0;
            while(j)
            {
                ctr=j%10;
                sum+=ctr;
                j/=10;
            }
            for(d=2;d<=sum/2;d++)
            {
                if(sum%d==0)
                    break;
            }
            if(d>sum/2&&sum>1)
                count++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",count);
    }
}
